evidence_example.title: MiWi_P2P protocol demo for MiniFlex board
evidence_example.small_descr: This is a demo showing how to use the Microchip MiWi_P2P stack with the MiniFlex board.
evidence_example.long_descr: In this demo, the miniflex reads its sensor devices (battery, temperature, light and accelerometer) and sends the data to an other board through the radio device. Moreover, it also receives sensor data from the other board and prints them on the console (UART).The received data can be displayed by a hyperterminal. Use for instance minicom or HTerm. The radio communication is managed by the MiWiP2P protocol.
